column4: firefox quite often hogs 100% of my cpu for 20-30 second periods. The mem is at about 16%. What's so cpu intensive for FF ? I'm not doing anything special in it ? It's not even loading new pages sometimes ...
cut down on resources ? I'm not using swap, and I'm only using a fraction of memory ...
shouldn't be a memory or resources leak ...
ff2 could eat my 320mb system ram in about nine hours.
yeah, i used to get that as well. it doesn't seem to be as bad anymore though ...
nah, ff3 fixed whatever it was.
